Title: Provides a New York state residential property tax relief act for public education aid apportionment for certain school years
Summary: Provides a New York state residential property tax relief act for public education aid apportionment for certain school years; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing a New York state residential property tax relief act for public education aid apportionment for certain school years; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
